document.docAuthor: Rodrigues, Juliana Mourão Dos Santos, Cordeiro, Isabelle Da Rocha Silva & Moreira, Felipe Ferraz Figueiredo
document.masterDocTitle: Additions and corrections to the type list of Heteroptera (Insecta: Hemiptera) of the Costa Lima Collection, Oswaldo Cruz Foundation

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Additions and corrections to the type list of Heteroptera (Insecta: Hemiptera) of the Costa Lima Collection, Oswaldo Cruz Foundation

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
buenoi
Costa Lima & Seabra, 1945a : 288
; Rutuba (holotype in Fig. 78 )

subSubSection.paragraph:
Present status:
Pnirontis buenoi
( Costa Lima & Seabra, 1945a ); new combination by Giacchi (1988: 7) Paratype male (n° 4039); Brazil: Angra dos Reis, Jussaral; Travassos col., IV-1931 .

Note:
Almeida et al. (2014)
did not find this specimen, but now it has been located.

subSubSection.paragraph: TABLE]. List of the type-specimens deposited in the Costa Lima Collection. When a given species has been synonymyzed or transferred from genus, the current valid name
displayed below it [HT, holotype. LT, lectotype. ST, paralectotype. AT, alotype. PT, paratype. PL, paralectotype. * Types not found. ** Manuscript names. *** Specimens
doubtful and no longer considered part of the type series].

paragraph.emphasis: Family Genus Species HT LT ST AT PT PL
